title: I already donated
content: How come I cannot download already give donation
creator: merlierhunter

title: After adding 2FA to my email accounts, cannot send/receive messages
content:
Subject says it.

Now I receive a popup asking for password, repeated after I enter the password found in Passwords. I have not altered any of the IMAP and SMTP settings.

Entries for both accounts appear correct in my authenticator.

TIA, Evan
creator: egamblin
